YUZU:SightModifiedVersion.NAME: Sight:Modified Version
YUZU:SightModifiedVersion.FLAVOR: Can be seamlessly integrated into weapons.
DESCRIPTIONS: 减少 #b1 格暴击槽需求。

YUZU:EnergyGatheringBomb.NAME: Energy Gathering Bomb
YUZU:EnergyGatheringBomb.FLAVOR: Can effectively utilize the excess energy generated by explosions.

YUZU:PortableBattery.NAME: PortableBattery
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Last for #b6 combats.

YUZU:RainbowCat.NAME: Rainbow Cat
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play more than #b15 cards in one turn, take an extra turn after this one. This effect can only be triggered once per combat.

YUZU:Torch.NAME: Torch
YUZU:Torch.FLAVOR: It can ignite a passionate and warm fire in people's hearts.
DESCRIPTIONS: After reaching the first campfire of each Act, gain [E] at the start of your turn in this Act.

YUZU:AiSight.NAME: AI Sight
YUZU:AiSight.FLAVOR: Eliminate the hassle of manual aiming.
